author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away. Includes individual presence drivers and composite aggregation driver for 'anyone home' functionality
releaseNotes: Version 0.4.0 - Major refactor of Composite Presence Driver: Removed direct PresenceSensor capability, now uses built-in Generic Component Presence Sensor for 'Anyone Presence' functionality. Unified DNI naming convention with device.id prefix for multi-instance support. Simplified aggregation logic and improved reliability.
